entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as standing with a small group of ancient-looking witches and wizards in the Great Hall. She looks rather nervous.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being pleased to see Umbridge looking nervous.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as suggesting they go and have a closer look at the examiners.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as nodding in agreement with Ron.

entities.name: professor marchbanks
entities.description: Professor Marchbanks is described as a tiny, stooped witch with a face so lined it looked as though it had been draped in cobwebs.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is mentioned as the location where Umbridge and Professor Marchbanks are standing.

entities.name: entrance hall
entities.description: The entrance hall is mentioned as the location where Harry, Ron, and Hermione approach the examiners.
